name: df-lsatoms
body: |- wceq(clsa, cmpt(s0, universe, crn(cmpt(s1, cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), csn(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))), cfv(cfv(clspn, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s1)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ LSAtoms =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ ran((s1 ‚àà((Base ` s0)\ {(0 ` s0)})‚Ü¶((LSpan ` s0)` { s1 }))))
comment: Define the set of all 1-dim subspaces (atoms) of a left module or left vector space. (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2014.)
